demandfunctions package¶

Submodules¶

demandfunctions.fixed_demand_function module¶

class demandfunctions.fixed_demand_function.FixedDemandFunction(fixed_quantity: int = 1)¶

Bases: demand_function.DemandFunction

A demand function which gives the same price every round.

fixed_quantity¶

A positive integer representing the quantity to be purchased from each agent every round.

Type

int

get_sales(current_prices: list[float]) → list[int]¶

Calculates the quantity of the product that will be sold at a given price for each agent.

Parameters

current_prices (list[float]) – The current price of the product set by all agents.

Returns

The quantity of item sold by each agent, indexed by where their price appeared in current_prices argument.

Return type

list[int]

Raises

NotImplementedError – If concrete class does not override method.

Module contents¶

simulation
